seniority_level.evidence: 6-7 years total experience with Associate Software Developer title and data engineer responsibilities indicates senior level

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' with core focus on data pipelines, ETL, data gathering and storage

sub_specialty.evidence: Azure Databricks, PySpark, ETL tools, and data integration focus with mention of both batch and real-time processing

leadership_expectation.evidence: No direct reports or mentoring responsibilities mentioned, focused on individual contributor work in collaborative environment

primary_cloud.evidence: Multiple Azure services explicitly mentioned: Azure Databricks, Azure Devops, Azure Blob storage

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers mentioned beyond Azure ecosystem

processing_paradigm.evidence: Explicitly mentions both 'batch and real-time processing' capabilities

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned, only Azure DevOps which could imply cloud-native but not explicitly stated

storage_layer.evidence: Azure Databricks with Azure Blob storage suggests lakehouse architecture pattern

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Kochi, Kerala, India but no explicit remote work policy or restrictions mentioned

timezone_focus.evidence: Location specified as Kochi, Kerala, India indicating India timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Location already specified as Kochi with no mention of relocation requirements

h1b_friendly.evidence: H1B not applicable for India location, no visa sponsorship mentioned

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No work authorization requirements specified for India location

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work authorization requirements mentioned for India-based position

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time position at IBM suggests standard W2 employment for corporate role

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in job posting despite being IBM corporate position

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career growth paths, advancement opportunities, or promotion discussions mentioned

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions working in 'collaborative environment' with 'scientists, engineers, consultants and database administrators' suggesting learning opportunities

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career growth paths mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal transfers, team changes, or role exploration mentioned

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between 'Mandatory Skills' and 'Preferred Technical And Professional Experience' with balanced requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused data engineering role with clear responsibilities around data pipelines, ETL, and processing - not multi-role hybrid

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 6-7 years experience with listed technical skills (Azure, Python, Spark, etc.) is reasonable for senior data engineer level
